original_title: Mark Knopfler: Live at Madison Square Garden 2019
overview: Mark Knopfler is adding a performance at New York Cityâ€™s famed Madison Square Garden on September 25 with special guest Bonnie Raitt to his North American tour in support of his critically acclaimed album, Down the Road Wherever.  On tour Knopfler performs with an expanded ten-piece band, most of whom have been working with him for more than two decades.
title: Mark Knopfler: Live at Madison Square Garden 2019
